story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_0300_10:
It seems you’ve had a number of painful
experiences...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_0500_10:
But I’m sure that’s led you to a few realizations,
hasn’t it.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_0600_10:
What is true strength? Why did you lose
to Giovanni?
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Come to think of it, I recall having a similar
conversation with a certain someone before...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_1200_10:
I never made any mistakes raising
my Pokémon...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_1400_10: I know... I know that I was wrong!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_1500_10: But I’ve thrown it all away! Rockruff, love, trust...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_1600_10:
I chose the wrong path! I don’t deserve to battle
beside you all anymore!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_1700_10:
And Rockruff... I can’t battle with him anymore,
either!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_2000_10: Even if YOU think that way...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_2400_10: We’ve restored your Pokémon to full health!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_2600_10:
He was lying low somewhere isolated, trying to
heal his wounds.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_2700_10: I think before Hoopa took Kyurem’s attack...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_2800_10: it used all of its power to get Rockruff to safety!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_3100_10: that we should go look for him together!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_3200_10:
Tina found him all banged up, so she carried him
all the way here.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_3300_10:
If we hadn’t treated him when we did, it would’ve
been awful!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_3400_10:
And if he’d been attacked by a Pokémon, he really
would have...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_3600_10:
Isn’t there someone else you should apologize
to first?
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4100_10: Will you still stay with me?
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4400_10:
I know it’s bold of me to say this after all
that’s happened...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4500_10:
I caused everyone a lot of grief, and I’m the
reason why we’re in this situation...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4600_10: And I know an apology may not be enough.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4700_10:
I’ll accept any punishment you want to give me
later. But first...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4800_10:
I want to work together with Rockruff and
everyone else...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_4900_10:
to protect this place—where people and Pokémon
can coexist!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_5100_10:
I might not be strong enough to do much on my
own, but still!
story_final_01_15000/2401_0302_5400_10: We’ve all been waiting for you.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_5700_10:
You’re still young! You can bounce back from your
mistakes, no matter how many you make!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_5800_10:
I’m an old man now! I’m too old to get the job
done myself.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_5900_10:
But if you plan on giving your all to pursue your
goals, I’ll do my best to support you!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6100_10: Also, I know something we can do!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6200_10:
Before I got here, Colress gave me this
weird device...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6300_10:
He said if you use it, you might be able to
return Hoopa to its usual form!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6500_10:
At least, I think so... I think he actually made it to
help you, Paulo.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6700_10: So many people were trying to help me...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6800_10: OK! Shall we go help everyone?
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_6900_10: Wait a sec. If we have Colress’s device...
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_7600_10:
Right now, the other sync pairs are battling
Team Rocket to protect Pasio, so they have
to focus on that.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_7700_10:
We’re the ones who can move around freely,
so let’s find Giovanni and save Hoopa by
returning it to its original form!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_7800_10: We don’t have to worry about defeating Giovanni.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_7900_10:
But we’ll probably have to battle in order to
create an opening.
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_8000_10:
When the time comes, can I depend on you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_8100_10: All right! Sounds like a plan!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_8300_10: Mwahahaha! Team Rocket’s in the house!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_8400_10: Do as you’re told, and surrender this center!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_8600_10: Let me take care of them!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_8900_10: We can hold our own, too!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_9100_10: You all go and save Hoopa!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_9400_10: This is an important job—to protect Pasio!
story_final_01_15000/2401_1201_9800_10: This time, it’s our turn to save you!
